title: Visa requirements for Serbian citizens
summary: Visa requirements for Serbian citizens are administrative entry restrictions by the authorities of other states placed on citizens of the Republic of Serbia. As of 11 October 2021, Serbian citizens had visa-free or visa on arrival access to 136 countries and territories, ranking the Serbian passport 37th overall in terms of travel freedom according to the Henley Passport Index.[1] The Serbian passport is one of 5 passports with the greatest improvement in rating since 2006.[2]
